attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unless a member of parliament provides documantary evidence in the form of a receipt, expenses should not be claimed and paid for. The claim on 2nd home incomes should be removed with immediate effect and all politicians working in London should pay for a 3*hotel and claim after (but for room and meals only) drinks out of own pocket. All expenses to be through 1 central accounting team who also inform Inland revenue for tax purposes as ALL expenses are tax related.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
